title: Heavily freezing with normal ping and FPS/Lost control of champions
body:
It just happened since this week, My internet seems ok, I would say my ping is around 50,  but When it happens your champion just stuck there sometimes go straight forward and you can't control it.I can only watch my champion was beat into death. The screen is not freezing but only my champion.The ping and FPS was normal will it happens,. I think its problem is even worse than normal lagging, because after normal lagging everything happens very fast,you might find you already dead.When this happens you have to watch your champion go straight into their turret but you cant do anything. I tried to set every quality (charactor, environment...) as low, but it didn't work. 

This experience is a torture. 

SO PLS FIX IT.

replies.body: It sounds like you may be experiencing a connection issue to our servers, which is causing you to lag spike.  I recommend running a Log Reader which will find what's going wrong and provide some steps to troubleshoot.  Please let me know if this hasn't fixed things up!

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Let us know if your issue improves or not.
